languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, мы проигнорировали передачу, как вы и приказали, но вокс-система засекла еще десяток входящих запросов! Их количество растет с каждой секундой, а каждый запрос становится все настойчивее и сильнее. Мне кажется... мне кажется, я что-то слышу..."

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, мы проигнорировали передачу, как вы и приказали, но вокс-система засекла еще десяток входящих запросов! Их количество растет с каждой секундой, а каждый запрос становится все настойчивее и сильнее. Мне кажется... мне кажется, я что-то слышу..."

languages.text: "Lord Captain, we ignored the transmission as you ordered, but the vox-system has detected a dozen more incoming requests! Their number is growing every second, and each one is becoming more insistent and stronger. I think... I think I hear something..."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, мы проигнорировали передачу, как вы и приказали, но вокс-система засекла еще десяток входящих запросов! Их количество растет с каждой секундой, а каждый запрос становится все настойчивее и сильнее. Мне кажется... мне кажется, я что-то слышу..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we ignored the transmission as you ordered, but the vox-system has detected a dozen more incoming requests! Their number is growing every second, and each one is becoming more insistent and stronger. I think... I think I hear something..."

"Lord Captain, we ignored the transmission as you ordered, but the vox-system has detected a dozen more incoming requests! Their number is growing every second, and each one is becoming more insistent and stronger. I think... I think I hear something..."

"Lord Captain, we ignored the transmission as you ordered, but the vox-system has detected a dozen more incoming requests! Their number is growing every second, and each one is becoming more insistent and stronger. I think... I think I hear something..."

"Lord Captain, we ignored the transmission as you ordered, but the vox-system has detected a dozen more incoming requests! Their number is growing every second, and each one is becoming more insistent and stronger. I think... I think I hear something..."

"Lord Captain, we ignored the transmission as you ordered, but the vox-system has detected a dozen more incoming requests! Their number is growing every second, and each one is becoming more insistent and stronger. I think... I think I hear something..."

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们按照您的指示，忽视了他们的请求，但音阵系统检测到了更多新增请求！新增请求的数量变得越来越多，而且每个请求信号都变得更加强烈，更加顽固。我觉得……我觉得我听到了什么……”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we ignored the transmission as you ordered, but the vox-system has detected a dozen more incoming requests! Their number is growing every second, and each one is becoming more insistent and stronger. I think... I think I hear something..."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们按照您的指示，忽视了他们的请求，但音阵系统检测到了更多新增请求！新增请求的数量变得越来越多，而且每个请求信号都变得更加强烈，更加顽固。我觉得……我觉得我听到了什么……”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hemos ignorado la transmisión como ha ordenado, ¡pero el sistema de vocos detecta otra docena de solicitudes entrantes! Son más a cada segundo que pasa, cada una más insistente que la anterior. Creo... Creo que oigo algo...».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we ignored the transmission as you ordered, but the vox-system has detected a dozen more incoming requests! Their number is growing every second, and each one is becoming more insistent and stronger. I think... I think I hear something..."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hemos ignorado la transmisión como ha ordenado, ¡pero el sistema de vocos detecta otra docena de solicitudes entrantes! Son más a cada segundo que pasa, cada una más insistente que la anterior. Creo... Creo que oigo algo...».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wir haben die Übertragung ignoriert, wie Sie es befohlen haben, aber das Vox-System hat ein Dutzend weitere eingehende Anfragen entdeckt! Ihre Zahl wächst jede Sekunde, und jede einzelne wird eindringlicher und stärker. Ich glaube ... Ich glaube, ich höre etwas ..."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we ignored the transmission as you ordered, but the vox-system has detected a dozen more incoming requests! Their number is growing every second, and each one is becoming more insistent and stronger. I think... I think I hear something..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we ignored the transmission as you ordered, but the vox-system has detected a dozen more incoming requests! Their number is growing every second, and each one is becoming more insistent and stronger. I think... I think I hear something..."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons ignoré la transmission conformément à vos ordres, mais les systèmes-vox détectent une douzaine d'autres demandes ! Leur nombre augmente à chaque seconde, et chacune d'elle est plus pressante et plus nette. Je crois... Je crois que j'entends quelque chose... »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we ignored the transmission as you ordered, but the vox-system has detected a dozen more incoming requests! Their number is growing every second, and each one is becoming more insistent and stronger. I think... I think I hear something..."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons ignoré la transmission conformément à vos ordres, mais les systèmes-vox détectent une douzaine d'autres demandes ! Leur nombre augmente à chaque seconde, et chacune d'elle est plus pressante et plus nette. Je crois... Je crois que j'entends quelque chose... »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ご命令通り通信を無視しましたが、ヴォクスシステムはさらに十数件のリクエストを検出しました！その数は毎秒増加していて、リクエストはどんどんしつこく激しくなっています。何か…聞こえてくるような…」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we ignored the transmission as you ordered, but the vox-system has detected a dozen more incoming requests! Their number is growing every second, and each one is becoming more insistent and stronger. I think... I think I hear something..."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ご命令通り通信を無視しましたが、ヴォクスシステムはさらに十数件のリクエストを検出しました！その数は毎秒増加していて、リクエストはどんどんしつこく激しくなっています。何か…聞こえてくるような…」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, emrettiğiniz gibi iletiyi görmezden geldik. Ancak voks sistemi, daha çok sayıda gelen talep tespit etti! Sayıları her geçen saniye artıyor, giderek daha ısrarcı ve güçlü hâle geliyorlar. Sanırım... Sanırım bir şeyler duyuyorum..."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we ignored the transmission as you ordered, but the vox-system has detected a dozen more incoming requests! Their number is growing every second, and each one is becoming more insistent and stronger. I think... I think I hear something..."
